question: Which is the only country in the world that forms the habitat of "Walia Ibex"?
explanation: Walia ibex is an ibex species only found in the northern mountains of Ethiopia. It was once widespread in the Semien Mountains of Ethiopia, which got declined during the 20th century. IUCN, in it's Red List of Threatened Species, classified it as a vulnerable species. Semien National Park forms the important conservation area of Walia Ibex.
